Products.title: Comprehensive Protection for Your Peace of Mind

detection.title: Alarms, security cameras, and motion sensors
detection.description: High-definition cameras and motion sensors to detect any suspicious activity in your home or business.

detection1.name: DAHUA SD22204DB-GNY
detection1.description: PTZ camera with 4x zoom, facial detection, and IK10 vandal-proof protection, ideal for outdoor monitoring with low lighting thanks to Starlight technology.

detection2.name: DAHUA SD49825GB-HNR
detection2.description: PTZ camera with 25x zoom, facial detection, and perimeter protection, ideal for high-precision outdoor monitoring, even in low-light conditions thanks to Starlight technology.

detection3.name: DAHUA DH-SD8A3440GA-HNV
detection3.description: PTZ camera with 40x zoom, IR night vision up to 500m, facial detection, and perimeter protection, ideal for high-precision outdoor monitoring in extreme conditions.

detection4.name: TP-LINK TAPO C425
detection4.description: Wireless WiFi camera with up to 300 days of battery life. Color night vision, intelligent detection with AI, and a 150° field of view. Weatherproof (IP66), compatible with Alexa and Google Home. Local or cloud storage with TAPO CARE.

detection5.name: TP-LINK TAPO D130
detection5.description: 5MP wired video doorphone with color night vision, intelligent AI detection, and two-way audio. Weatherproof (IP65) and compatible with Alexa and Google Home. Local or cloud storage (Tapo Care), and 180° field of view.

detection6.name: TP-LINK - Tapo T100
detection6.description: Detects motion up to 7 meters with a 120° angle. Works with other Tapo devices, triggering alarms or lights automatically. Adjustable sensitivity with 3 levels, CR2450 battery for 2 years of use, and easy installation with 3M adhesive or magnet. Compatible only with Tapo Hub.

detection7.name: TP-Link Tapo C720
detection7.description: Outdoor camera with 2800-lumen spotlights, 2K QHD vision, and intelligent AI detection. Weatherproof (IP65), compatible with Alexa and Google Home. Local or cloud storage (Tapo Care). Customizable activity zones and alarms.

detection8.name: DAHUA DHI-TPC-SD5441-B35Z45-BM-S24
detection8.description: Hybrid IP camera with thermal and visible 4MP lens, 45x optical zoom, IR up to 100m, and AI functions like boat, smoke, and intrusion detection. Weatherproof (IP66) and thermal-visible image fusion. Perfect for surveillance in low light or darkness.

detection9.name: DAHUA SD6AL445GB-HNV
detection9.description: 4MP IP PTZ camera with 45x zoom and laser light up to 550m. Starlight technology, Auto Tracking 3.0, and intelligent motion detection. Weatherproof and dustproof (IP67). Ideal for outdoor security.

ip.title: IP Cameras
ip.description: High-resolution cameras, night vision, facial detection, and intelligent analysis, ideal for commercial, residential, and mobile environments. Durable, with local storage and advanced technologies for efficient and reliable surveillance.

ip1.name: DAHUA DH-IPC-HDW5449TM-SE-LED-0280B
ip1.description: 4MP Full Color camera, night vision, 2.8 mm lens, and 135° field of view. Features H.265, WizMind, AcuPick, facial detection, people counting, microphone, 30m range, and IP67. Includes Micro SD slot, ePoE technology, and SMD 3.0 for precise detection.

ip2.name: DAHUA DH-SDT4E425-8P-GB-APV1
ip2.description: 8MP + 4MP PTZ IP camera with 25X optical zoom and night vision up to 100m. Features Autotracking 3.0, perimeter protection, SMD 4.0, and active deterrence with lights and alarms. Equipped with WDR, IP66 certification, ideal for demanding environments.

ip3.name: DAHUA IPC-HFW5241E-Z12E
ip3.description: 2MP Bullet IP camera with AI, including facial detection and people counting. Its 5-60mm motorized lens and night vision up to 150m make it perfect for perimeter monitoring in any condition. Weatherproof (IP67/IK10) and compatible with alarm and audio systems, providing intelligent and reliable monitoring.

ip4.name: DAHUA IPC-MW1230DN-HM12
ip4.description: 2MP mobile IP camera designed for vehicles, with 2.8mm lens and IR night vision up to 30m. Vibration, shock, and extreme condition resistant (IP6K9K), ideal for monitoring trains, buses, and other vehicles, with support for high-pressure cleaning.

ip5.name: DAHUA IPC-HDBW5241FN-M-DAE-SA-0210B
ip5.description: 2MP Dome IP camera with 2.1mm lens and 110° field of view, ideal for people counting in vehicles. Features 120dB WDR, 30m IR, IK10 and IP67 vandal-proof protection. Supports H.264+/H.265+ encoding and works in mobile environments like trains or buses. Includes facial detection and people counting.

ip6.name: DAHUA IPC-HDBW5241FN-M-DAE-SA-0280B
ip6.description: 2MP camera designed for mobile environments like trains and buses. Includes facial detection, people counting, and IP67, IK10 protection. Its 2.8mm lens offers wide vision and night vision up to 30m. Supports microSD storage and is compatible with platforms like DMSS and CMS.

ip7.name: DAHUA DH-IPC-HDW8441X-3D-0280B
ip7.description: This IP camera is ideal for people counting and crowd management. Offers 3MP resolution, 2.8mm lens, H.265 compression, and IP67 and IK10 protection. Supports PoE and local storage on microSD card up to 256GB, perfect for monitoring commercial spaces and events.

ip8.name: DAHUA DH-IPC-HFW5442E-ZE
ip8.description: 4MP Bullet IP camera with motorized lens and infrared vision up to 60 meters. Supports PoE and local microSD storage up to 256GB. Durable with IP67 and IK10, ideal for outdoor use. Includes advanced technologies like facial detection and people counting.

ip9.name: DAHUA DH-DAE-CPC5241FPN-0280B
ip9.description: 2MP Dome IP camera with 2.8mm lens and 20m night vision. Ideal for people counting in vehicles, with 120dB WDR and IK10 vandal-proof protection. Resistant to harsh conditions with IP67 rating. Compatible with mobile NVRs.

dvr.title: NVRs and DVRs
dvr.description: Range of high-resolution NVRs (up to 4K) with advanced features such as facial recognition, perimeter protection, and intelligent compression. Ideal for residential and commercial installations, offering flexible storage and remote monitoring.

dvr1.name: Bundle BuenFin1 NVR+2BulletIP
dvr1.description: 4-channel NVR with two 2MP cameras, night vision up to 30 meters, ideal for small installations. Waterproof and dustproof, perfect for both indoor and outdoor use, with easy installation and remote monitoring.

dvr2.name: AHUA DHI-NVR5864-16P-EI
dvr2.description: This NVR supports up to 64 4K IP cameras, with 16 PoE ports for simplified installation. Includes advanced AI features such as facial recognition and perimeter protection, ideal for large security installations.

dvr3.name: DAHUA NVR616-64-4KS2
dvr3.description: 64-channel network recorder with 4K support, H.265/H.264 compression, and 384 Mbps recording. Includes DEWARP function for fisheye cameras and two HDMI outputs, ideal for large video surveillance systems.

dvr4.name: DAHUA NVR4232-4KS2/L
dvr4.description: 32-channel 4K recorder, with H.265 compression, SMD Plus, and facial recognition. Compatible with ONVIF cameras and disks up to 10 TB. Ideal for advanced video surveillance.

dvr5.name: DAHUA DHI-NVR5216-8P-I/L
dvr5.description: 32-channel 4K recorder, with H.265 compression, SMD Plus, and facial recognition. Compatible with ONVIF cameras and disks up to 10 TB. Ideal for advanced video surveillance.

dvr6.name: DAHUA NVR4216-4KS2/L
dvr6.description: 8MP 16-channel NVR with 4K resolution, Smart H.265+ compression, SMD Plus intelligent motion detection, HDMI and VGA outputs, and support for up to 10 TB hard drives. Ideal for advanced video surveillance with real-time analysis.

dvr7.name: DAHUA NVR1104HS-P-S3/H
dvr7.description: 4-channel IP NVR with support for ONVIF and RTSP cameras, Smart H.265+ and H.264 compression, 4 PoE ports, HDMI and VGA output (1080P resolution), and up to 8TB storage. Ideal for low-power video surveillance and easy installation.

dvr8.name: VIVOTEK NR9782-v2
dvr8.description: 128-channel NVR with 16 bays, 512 Mbps recording, and support for H.265/H.264. Includes VAST 2, Smart Search II, and cybersecurity management, ideal for large installations.

dvr9.name: DAHUA NVR5216-16P-EI
dvr9.description: 16-channel IP NVR with PoE, H.265+/H.265 recording, 384 Mbps bandwidth. Includes AI features like facial recognition and perimeter protection, compatible with cameras and VMS systems. Supports up to 2 disks of 20 TB and up to 16 channels at 1080p or 4 MP.

Hero.imgAlt: Illustration of a person managing their home security

text.afterText: we specialize in providing tailored security solutions for homes and businesses in Mérida, Yucatán. With a wide range of security cameras and professional monitoring services, we are here to protect what you value most.

tech.title: Advanced Technology
tech.description: Our security cameras in Mérida are equipped with the latest surveillance technology, ensuring clear and sharp images, even in low light conditions.

monitoring.title: 24/7 Monitoring
monitoring.description: We offer continuous monitoring services, ensuring your property is protected at all times. Our team is ready to respond to any eventuality.

installation.title: Professional Security System Installation
installation.description: We have highly trained technicians who perform the installation quickly and efficiently, ensuring each camera is positioned to maximize its effectiveness.

TabsResidential.title: Find the Perfect Solution for Your Home

house.title: Protection at the Right Time
house.text: Maria, worried about strange movements near her house and the safety of her family, contacted our company. Within 48 hours, we installed cameras with night vision and remote monitoring, which one night detected an intruder. Thanks to the alert, Maria called the authorities and now lives peacefully and protected.

apartment.title: Personalized Monitoring for Apartments
apartment.text: Carlos lived in an apartment and noticed packages disappearing from the entrance. We installed strategic cameras in common areas and access points. A week later, the security system identified the culprit, and with the evidence, the management took action. Now, all residents enjoy greater security.

residential.title: Comprehensive Protection for Residences
residential.text: In a gated community, neighbors were reporting car thefts. We designed a security system with alarms and cameras for entrances, common areas, and each interested house. One night, the cameras captured a theft attempt, and the alert prevented the incident. Since then, the community lives more peacefully.

hightValue.title: Exclusive Care for Luxury Homes
hightValue.text: Mariana lived in a house with high-value items, but she knew her home needed more protection. She decided to contact us to install security equipment in her Mérida home. Since the installation of the cameras and the monitoring system, she has gained peace of mind knowing her property is constantly monitored. Now, she feels safer, confident that she made the best decision to protect her assets.

TabsCompany.title: Find the Perfect Solution for Your Business
TabsCompany.text1: Security cameras in businesses offer multiple benefits beyond simple surveillance. Here are some of the key functions the security system serves in a commercial environment.
TabsCompany.text2: Criminals or dishonest workers are less likely to act if they know they are being recorded, as they have managed to evade human supervision.

restaurant.title: Employee Supervision in Restaurant Chains
restaurant.text: Employees may steal merchandise and not be seen at first, but they are discovered through frequent incidents that raise suspicions. We monitor these behaviors until we capture the moment of theft.
restaurant.ctaText: Request a Quote for My Restaurant

cash.title: Security Systems in Pawn Shops Against Theft
cash.text: This crime can be committed through price changes by employees and involves both customers and sellers in this dishonest practice. Our job is to monitor these behaviors until the misconduct is caught in the act.
cash.ctaText: Request a Quote for My Pawn Shop

retail.title: Monitoring of Customers and Employees in Retail Stores
retail.text: Stores are often vulnerable to both internal and external theft. Our team focuses on identifying employees who may engage in unethical practices, such as mishandling inventories, and monitoring customers with suspicious behaviors. We ensure evidence collection in each case to protect your assets and maintain the proper flow of your business operations.
retail.ctaText: Request a Quote for My Store

hotel.title: Comprehensive Security for the Hospitality Sector
hotel.text: We provide surveillance in common areas, parking lots, and sensitive areas such as storage rooms or cash registers. These areas are often targets for malicious actions that can compromise the security and experience of your customers. Our team implements measures like CCTV (Closed Circuit TV), alarms, and security cameras to identify risk patterns and protect your facilities in Mérida consistently.
hotel.ctaText: Request a Quote for My Hotel

industry.title: Monitoring Critical Areas in Plants and Factories
industry.text: We protect your facilities and machinery in Yucatán with high-precision cameras, designed to capture suspicious activity in real-time. Our approach includes monitoring restricted access areas, overseeing sensitive materials, and detecting unauthorized behaviors that may compromise the continuity of your production.
industry.ctaText: Request a Quote for My Plant or Factory

offices.title: Access Control and Monitoring in Corporate Offices
offices.text: We implement security systems that ensure the protection of your employees, visitors, and business assets. From monitoring servers and confidential files to controlling access in strategic areas, our service ensures a safe working environment, identifying and preventing potential risks.
offices.ctaText: Request a Quote for My Office

education.title: Protection for Schools and Universities
education.text: We ensure surveillance in educational facilities, monitoring access points, common areas, and spaces like laboratories or recreational zones. Our approach focuses on preventing incidents and ensuring a safe environment for both students and academic staff, adapting to the specific needs of each institution.
education.ctaText: Request a Quote for My Educational Institution

construction.title: Monitoring at Construction Sites
construction.text: We install specialized cameras to prevent theft of materials and machinery at construction sites. Additionally, we monitor activity in real-time, detecting unusual behaviors or risks that may delay the progress of your project, ensuring everything proceeds as planned.
construction.ctaText: Request a Quote for My Construction Project

transport.title: Security for Transport Stations and Fleets
transport.text: We provide strategic surveillance at stations, terminals, and moving vehicles. Our system includes real-time monitoring to protect both passengers and goods during transit, preventing acts of vandalism, theft, or any incident that compromises security.
transport.ctaText: Request a Quote for My Transport Business

government.title: Security for Government Offices and Infrastructure
government.text: We guarantee monitoring in public buildings and critical areas like essential services plants, workstations, and high-traffic spaces. We focus on identifying potential threats and preventing vandalism, ensuring the continuity and security of government operations.
government.ctaText: Request a Quote for My Government Entity

entertainment.title: Surveillance for Cinemas, Theaters, and Gyms
entertainment.text: We ensure protection in recreational and cultural spaces through monitoring systems designed to oversee both customer and staff areas. Our approach includes supervision in sensitive points like box offices, storage rooms, and restricted access, preventing incidents that could affect the operation of your business.
entertainment.ctaText: Request a Quote for My Entertainment Business

finance.title: Security for Banks and Financial Offices
finance.text: We provide high-precision surveillance systems to protect sensitive areas such as vaults, ATMs, and confidential files. Additionally, we monitor in real-time to identify any suspicious activity that may endanger the security of your employees, customers, or financial assets.
finance.ctaText: Request a Quote for My Financial Institution

prevention.title: Crime Prevention
prevention.description: The visible presence of cameras in Yucatán discourages criminals, reducing the risk of theft or vandalism.

peace.title: Peace of Mind
peace.description: The presence of CCTV (Closed Circuit TV) will give you peace of mind knowing your home or business in Mérida is protected, allowing you to live and work without worry.

support.title: Personalized Support
support.description: Our team is available to answer your questions and tailor our services to your specific needs.

The cameras have clear images, even at night, and the notification system alerted me in time of a break-in attempt. I feel much safer now.
provided us with very professional service. The 24-hour monitoring service gives us peace of mind, and the quality of the cameras is excellent. Highly recommended!
